Legal_Issue: Whether the LCBO's use of 'Millennium' as an official mark conflicts with the applicant's trademark rights
Evidence_Assessment: The LCBO provided insufficient evidence to prove prior adoption and use of 'Millennium' as an official mark
Decision_Outcome: The court found the LCBO's claim unconvincing; the public notice is ineffective
Burden_of_Proof: On LCBO to demonstrate prior adoption and use of the official mark
Credibility_Factor: LCBO's claim was deemed unconvincing due to lack of substantiation
Legal_Rule: Subparagraph 9(1)(n)(iii) of the Trade-marks Act governs official marks adopted by public authorities and their precedence over trademarks
Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness or correctness, as applicable in judicial review of Registrar's decision
Procedural_Issue: Registrar's decision to publish the LCBO's official mark despite potential conflict
Grounds_for_Claim: Conflict between LCBO's official mark and applicant's registered trademark
Outcome_on_Merits: LCBO did not adequately prove adoption and use; official mark declared ineffective
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Registrar's publication decision challenged for failing to consider valid trademark rights
Key_Evidence_Considered: Evidence (or lack thereof) of LCBO's prior adoption and use of 'Millennium' as an official mark
Applicant_Challenge: Challenging the validity of the LCBO's official mark publication
Court_Result: Allowed the application, declared LCBO's official mark ineffective
Defendant_Response: LCBO claimed prior adoption and use of 'Millennium' as an official mark
Evidence_Type: Documentary and procedural evidence regarding adoption and use
Remedy_Requested: Declaration that LCBO's official mark is ineffective
Remedy_Sought: Judicial declaration invalidating the official mark status
Legal_Provision: Sections 9 and 11, Subparagraph 9(1)(n)(iii) of the Trade-marks Act
Claimant_Status: Owner of registered trademark 'Millennium' for alcoholic beverages
Legal_Provision_Cited: Sections 9, 11, and 9(1)(n)(iii) of the Trade-marks Act
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Insufficient proof of adoption and use by LCBO
Applicable_Process: Administrative registration process under the Trade-marks Act
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Judicial review application pending before the court
Jurisdiction: Federal jurisdiction under Canadian trademark law
